original_title: Angola Do You Hear Us? Voices from a Plantation Prison
overview: Angola Do You Hear Us? Voices from a Plantation Prison tells the story of playwright Liza Jessie Peterson's 2020 performance of her acclaimed play The Peculiar Patriot at Angola, the Louisiana State Penitentiary, Americaâ€™s largest prison.
title: Angola Do You Hear Us? Voices from a Plantation Prison
